title: gaurimanOhariyE enadu kalai
sahitya:
gaurimanOhariyE enadu kalai kavinpera aruL puriyE


anupallavi

  dhairya vANi tA taghunda pulavar sabhai taram arindu magizha vara kavigaL pugazha


caraNam    iyal isai nATakam iyalburat-tulangiDa eLiya naDaiyum poruL Etramum viLangiDa
Kuyilenak-kuraluDan nayamurappaDi nAn kuvalaya vAzhvilE navayugam kUDiDa
